Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Fate of Atlantis | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — The Fate of Atlantis]]''

MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' - 'The Fate of Atlantis: Fields of Elysium'
MemoryInfobox.location: Ruins of Rhadamanthos, Minos' Faith, Elysium

General_Description: '''Keep Your Eye On Me''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''The eyes of the [[Marble Maiden Tribute|Marble Maiden]] are wise to watch the river [[Styx]], especially in this unpredictable corner of [[Elysium]]. While she keeps her sights on the [[Mortal Encampment]] of [[Adonis]]'s rebels, I act as an offering to her until you take me for yourself.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' - ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Fields of Elysium]]''
